messages.messageBody:
"Suzan Dees" <suzandees@...> wrote:
> My son (13) just started playing. He bought the game only last
weekend. He was teaching me how to play tonight as a matter of fact! :-

Let me know if he wants to connect online! She always enjoyed playing
with other people she knew in WOW, it makes the game more fun!

She just joined a Guild which is another fun way to play. I can get
that info if he wants to join!
Jann

messages.messageBody:
My son (13) just started playing. He bought the game only last weekend. He
was teaching me how to play tonight as a matter of fact! :-)

Suzan

> Guild Wars instead. She's interested in connecting with "real people"

messages.subject: Guild Wars
messages.msgSnippet: Is anyone currently playing Guild Wars?  My dd (14) has been into WOW for 2 years and recently reached level 70, then decided she wanted to take a break from
messages.messageBody:
Is anyone currently playing Guild Wars? My dd (14) has been into WOW
for 2 years and recently reached level 70, then decided she wanted to
take a break from it (actually uninstalled it) and has been playing
Guild Wars instead. She's interested in connecting with "real people"
in the game.
Thanks
Jann
